at.htl.geometrics

Class PolarVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.htl.geometrics.PolarVector

  • public class PolarVector
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a vector in polar form (magnitude z and angle φ).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jakob Ecker, Domink Simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolarVector()
      Constructs a new empty PolarVector - object.
      PolarVector(double z, double phi)
      Constructs a new polar vector with magnitude z and angle φ.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getPhi()
      Returns the angle φ of the PolarVector.
      double getZ()
      Returns the magnitude z of the PolarVector.
      void setPhi(double phi)
      Sets the angle φ of the PolarVector.
      void setZ(double z)
      Sets the magnitude z of the PolarVector.
      CartesianVector toCartesianVector()
      Converts the polar form into a vector of cartesian form with magnitude z and angle φ.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Custom toString that returns a formatted PolarVector.
